name: UrubutoPay For Woocommerce
author: BKTechouse

sections.description:
UrubutoPay For Woocommerce plugin enables you to accept online payments,
including mobile wallets, credit and debit cards other payment methods.

WHY CHOOSE URUBUTOPAY?

We provide a secure payment experience, real time settlement and an advanced data insight tool for decision making.
We support a range of local and international payment methods via web, apps and USSD.

FAQ’S

** WHAT ARE THE REQUIREMENTS ? **
You need to be registered to receive a merchant code, service code and token key. No need to come to our offices , visit https://urubutopay.rw/ and registered today.

** WHAT CURRENCIES ARE SUPPORTED? **
We support RWF and USD Currencies.

** I NEED SOME ASSISTANCE. WHOM CAN I CONTACT? **
Need help to configure this plugin? Feel free to connect with our Support Team at bktechouse@bk.rw give us a call at +250 788195700 – Call Center 7740
sections.installation:
Here’s an overview of the installation.

  1. Log in as an admin and click on the Plugins menu on the sidebar.
  2. Click Add new.
  3. In the search bar enter “urubutopay for woocommerce” and click search plugins.
  4. When you find the plugin called UrubutoPay For Woocommerce click the install now link.
  5. Activate the Plugin.
  6. On The left side menu of your wordpress admin panel
  7. under woocommerce menu, click on settings
  8. click on Payments tab
  9. You will UrubutoPay under Payment Methods section
  10. Activate it and click on manage button
  11. You will be redirected to the setting page
  12. Then provide all details requested. ex: merchant code, service code, api key etc
